original: @297a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @297a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba panytsa aa mri ta sa ra siddhi mah'a du ka hri da y'a na pa ra bid tvan aashta /
analyzed: sarba panytsa aa mri ta sa ra siddhi mah'a du ka hri da y'a na pa ra bid tvan aashta /
translated: Sarva pañca amṛta siddhi mahā duka hṛdaya nāma parivarta aṣṭa.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po mchog bam po chen po brgyad pa /
analyzed: thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po mchog bam po chen po brgyad pa /
translated: The supreme essence of the great siddhi of the nature of all five nectars, in eight great volumes.

original: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Samantabhadra!

original: bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na //
analyzed: bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na //
translated: In the mandala of the Bhagavān's supreme secret,

original: shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs //
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs //
translated: The assembly of lords of the highest yoga,

original: rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas //
analyzed: rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas //
translated: The ocean of victors together with their retinues,

original: skal ldan rnams dang thabs cig bzhugs //
analyzed: skal ldan rnams dang thabs cig bzhugs //
translated: Reside together with the fortunate ones.

original: gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na //
analyzed: gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na //
translated: In the mandala of the supreme abode, the mother,

original: gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe //
analyzed: gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe //
translated: When abiding spontaneously without duality,🔽At that time, within the great saṅgha of śrāvakas,🔽The sūtras of the Mahāyāna pratyekabuddhas,🔽The saṅgha of bodhisattvas,

original: de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang // rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang // byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang // nyan thos dge 'dun chen po dang // dgra bcom ming yang med nang du //
analyzed: de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang // rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang // byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang // nyan thos dge 'dun chen po dang // dgra bcom ming yang med nang du //
translated: And the great saṅgha of śrāvakas,🔽Even the names of arhats do not exist.

original: kun @297b bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
analyzed: kun @297b bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
translated: From the maṇḍala of the mind of Samantabhadra,

original: dgongs te 'di skad bstan pa'i lung //
analyzed: dgongs te 'di skad bstan pa'i lung //
translated: the transcendent state is the transmission of this statement.🔽At one time, when it was explained and unraveled,

original: bshad cing 'grol ba'i dus gcig dang // 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na //
analyzed: bshad cing 'grol ba'i dus gcig dang // 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na //
translated: at one time, when this was taught,

original: srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga //
analyzed: srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga //
translated: the three existences are the five original nectars.

original: ma bcos ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: ma bcos ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: Unfabricated, perfect buddhahood from the beginning.

original: kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas //
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas //
translated: From the heart maṇḍala of Samantabhadra,

original: dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs //
translated: the body, speech, and mind of the three times and three existences

original: ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir //
translated: are the five original nectars.

original: nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal pa //
translated: Therefore, the definitive space was spoken:

original: zab mo'i klong nas phyung ste bstan //
analyzed: zab mo'i klong nas phyung ste bstan //
translated: “Extracted from the profound space, it is taught.”🔽Then, all the sugatas

original: de nas bde gshegs thams cad dang // thabs cig bzhugs te dgongs pa ni //
analyzed: de nas bde gshegs thams cad dang // thabs cig bzhugs te dgongs pa ni //
translated: gathered together and attained the transcendent state

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu //
translated: of unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: ye shes mnyam nyid nyams rnyed nas //
analyzed: ye shes mnyam nyid nyams rnyed nas //
translated: Having attained the experience of the uniform pristine consciousness,

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de //
translated: the secret vajra was arrayed,

original: kun gyi dam par 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: kun gyi dam par 'di gsungs so //
translated: and this was said to be the best of all:

original: bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung //
analyzed: bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung //
translated: “The definitive, supreme, sublime transmission

original: nges par phyung ste gsungs pa 'di'o //
analyzed: nges par phyung ste gsungs pa 'di'o //
translated: has been extracted and taught.”

original: sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba dang // 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba dang // 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishment, the object of attainment, and the attainment of the result,

original: gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag 'di //
analyzed: gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag 'di //
translated: this secret instruction of secret mantra

original: bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung //
analyzed: bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung //
translated: is the foremost, sublime, supreme elixir.

original: snying por bsdus pa'i nges par 'di //
analyzed: snying por bsdus pa'i nges par 'di //
translated: This definitive, essential summary

original: byang chub 'byung ba snying po mchog /
analyzed: byang chub 'byung ba snying po mchog /
translated: is the supreme essence of the origin of awakening.🔽For the sake of view, conduct,🔽samaya, accomplishment, activity,

original: lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // dam tshig sgrub pa 'phrin las dang // nges par sgrub dang bsgrub bya'i phyir //
analyzed: lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // dam tshig sgrub pa 'phrin las dang // nges par sgrub dang bsgrub bya'i phyir //
translated: definite accomplishment, and the object of accomplishment,

original: zab mo bsdus pa'i lung 'di gsungs //
analyzed: zab mo bsdus pa'i lung 'di gsungs //
translated: this profound, condensed transmission is taught.🔽The inconceivable teachings

original: bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang // brgyad khri bzhi @298a *//
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang // brgyad khri bzhi @298a *//
translated: and the enumerations of eighty-four thousand

original: stong rnam grangs kyang //
analyzed: stong rnam grangs kyang //
translated: are also said to be

original: theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs //
analyzed: theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs //
translated: the three doors of the vehicle.

original: gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi //
analyzed: gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi //
translated: The secret itself is included in the vehicle, making four.

original: ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang //🔽bkri ba'i don du sangs rgyas yin //
analyzed: ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang // bkri ba'i don du sangs rgyas yin //
translated: The ultimate is also for the purpose of guidance.

original: rna brgyud bstan pas thugs brtol te //
analyzed: rna brgyud bstan pas thugs brtol te //
translated: The mind is penetrated by the whispered lineage teachings

original: thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir //
translated: because the bindu pervades the dharmakāya.

original: nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so //
translated: The definitive scriptures are the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro //
translated: The Buddha is equal and goes to the dhātu.

original: nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu //
analyzed: nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu //
translated: The definitive scriptures are also of one kind.

original: gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te //
analyzed: gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te //
translated: The secret of the secret mantra is the Buddha.

original: byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag /
analyzed: byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag /
translated: This bodhicitta is completely pure.

original: rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid //
translated: Perfect pristine consciousness is great bliss itself.

original: ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya //
analyzed: ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya //
translated: It is the seal of all without exception.

original: ye nas bya med bya mi dgos //
analyzed: ye nas bya med bya mi dgos //
translated: From the beginning, there is nothing to do; there is no need to do anything.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul ba'i sgra //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul ba'i sgra //
translated: The words of delusion of cause and effect

original: mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul min no //
analyzed: mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul min no //
translated: are not the object of nonconceptual purification.

original: de lta'i yul du rtog 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: de lta'i yul du rtog 'dzin gyis //
translated: If one conceptualizes an object in that way,

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin //
translated: one will be in the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: nges 'byung chos sku chen po la //
analyzed: nges 'byung chos sku chen po la //
translated: In the great dharmakāya, which is free from conceptual grasping,

original: bha gar ji bzhin bzhag pas na //
analyzed: bha gar ji bzhin bzhag pas na //
translated: since it is placed in the bhaga just as it is,

original: byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med //
analyzed: byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med //
translated: there is no falling away from awakening.

original: bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos //
analyzed: bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos //
translated: O child, rest in bliss without effort.

original: rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang //
analyzed: rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang //
translated: The tantras, the scriptures, and the intimate instructions

original: dmangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul //
analyzed: dmangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul //
translated: are like the castes of śūdra, vaiśya, and kṣatriya.

original: khyad par rtsal 'phang thag ring yang //
analyzed: khyad par rtsal 'phang thag ring yang //
translated: Although the special abilities are far apart,

original: gcig la gcig rten gcig gi dang // dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin pas //
analyzed: gcig la gcig rten gcig gi dang // dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin pas //
translated: because they are inseparable, and because they are the same mode,🔽and because they are the nature.

original: gcig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis med //
analyzed: gcig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis med //
translated: They are one, and there are no enumerations at all.

original: dbyer med dang du @298b rtogs pa la //
analyzed: dbyer med dang du @298b rtogs pa la //
translated: In the realization of the inseparability of those two,

original: bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o //
translated: it is called “amṛta.”

original: de las sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /
analyzed: de las sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /
translated: From that, there is the nature of body, speech, and mind.

original: sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang //
analyzed: sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang //
translated: The body, ornaments, and wheels

original: lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal //
analyzed: lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal //
translated: are also clear in the profound, great scripture.

original: lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang //
analyzed: lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang //
translated: The five and four that revolve within

original: ye shes sangs rgyas de las med //
analyzed: ye shes sangs rgyas de las med //
translated: are not other than the pristine consciousness of buddhahood.

original: dbyings su gyur pas mnyam gnas pas //
analyzed: dbyings su gyur pas mnyam gnas pas //
translated: Since they are transformed into the dhātu, they abide equally,

original: ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid //
analyzed: ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid //
translated: and pristine consciousness is always the great bliss of buddhahood.

original: bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod //
analyzed: bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod //
translated: That is called “amṛta.”

original: skye shi med pa'i dbyings su gyur //
analyzed: skye shi med pa'i dbyings su gyur //
translated: It is transformed into the dhātu of nonbirth and nondeath.

original: dbyings 'gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas //
analyzed: dbyings 'gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas //
translated: Since the dhātu is transformed into purity, equality, and natural perfection,

original: lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi //
translated: this yoga of abiding in this view

original: rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang //
translated: is fortunate.

original: ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrubs kyang //
analyzed: ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrubs kyang //
translated: Whatever is practiced, meditated upon, or accomplished

original: bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog /
analyzed: bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog /
translated: is amṛta itself, the supreme medicine.

original: bde gshegs nyid kyi thugs dam nyid //
analyzed: bde gshegs nyid kyi thugs dam nyid //
translated: It is the pledge of the sugatas themselves.

original: byin rlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung //
analyzed: byin rlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung //
translated: The blessings will arise in a great and wondrous way.

original: rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos //
analyzed: rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos //
translated: The medicine of the ocean of victors

original: sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung //
translated: Arises from the great bliss of the buddhas.

original: thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di //
analyzed: thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di //
translated: This nectar of all that exists

original: spros med thig ler gnas pa las //
analyzed: spros med thig ler gnas pa las //
translated: Resides in the bindu of nonconceptuality.

original: mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir //
analyzed: mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir //
translated: For the sake of infinite sentient beings,

original: rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'//
analyzed: rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'//
translated: Make offerings to yourself and consume yourself.

original: sgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos //
translated: The practitioner should be diligent.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos //
translated: Thus it was said by the transcendent conqueror Samantabhadra,🔽Who contemplated this from the mind of great wisdom.

original: ye shes chen po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal pa'o; ;bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las /
analyzed: ye shes chen po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal pa'o; ;bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las /
translated: From the Tantra of the Supreme Great Bliss,🔽This is the first secret topic, the great intimate instruction for

original: byang chub sems de kho na nyid lta bar bstan pa'i man ngag chen po gsang ba'i don dang po ste /🔽thugs kyi rgya mtsho nang @299a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems de kho na nyid lta bar bstan pa'i man ngag chen po gsang ba'i don dang po ste / thugs kyi rgya mtsho nang @299a *//
translated: viewing the suchness of bodhicitta.🔽From the great secret treasury

original: nas gsang ba'i mdzod chen po las /
analyzed: nas gsang ba'i mdzod chen po las /
translated: Within the ocean of mind,

original: bam po chen po brgyad pa'i dang po'o ////
analyzed: bam po chen po brgyad pa'i dang po'o ////
translated: This is the first of the eight great sections.
